Vulnerability.Title: new packages: libtomcrypt
Vulnerability.Description: The libtomcrypt packages provide a comprehensive, modular and portable cryptographic toolkit that gives developers a vast array of well-known published block ciphers, one-way hash functions, chaining modes, pseudo-random number generators, public key cryptography, and a many other routines. This enhancement update adds the libtomcrypt packages to Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. (BZ#1448272) Users of libtomcrypt are advised to install these packages. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
